Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Red Hare Studios is an entrepreneurial game company based in Singapore since 2008.
Like the horse of legend that inspired our namesake, we are about strength and determination. We are creative professionals who advocate forward thinking while not abandoning traditions. What we do? First, Interactive Entertainment. We create fun and engaging experiences for both commercial and educational markets on multiple platforms. Next, Software Technologies. We specialise in the design and development of reliable and high-quality solutions to aid in your businesses and campaigns. Last but not least, Consultation & Mentoring. We are passionate about helping our customers by learning and listening to their concerns.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Audio Files: Background music, voiceovers, and sound effects MP4 basis.
Animations & Sprites: Character animations, sprite sheets, and motion capture  
Game Maps: Designed maps
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use a program to split and merge the data set, package the data files, and store them in two copies in the cooperating SP.
